description: The purpose of ADaM is to provide a framework that enables analysis of the data, while at the same time allowing reviewers and other recipients of the data to have a clear understanding of the data's lineage from collection to analysis to results. Whereas ADaM is optimized to support data derivation and analysis, CDISC's Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) is optimized to support data tabulation.
label: Analysis Data Model Version 2.1
name: ADaM v2.1
source: Prepared by the CDISC Analysis Data Model Team
